docs.text: Galacticraft API The Galacticraft addon API. Installing Groovy ( build.gradle ) repositories { maven { url "https://maven.galacticraft.dev" content { includeGroup ( "dev.galacticraft" ) } } } dependencies { include modApi "dev.galacticraft:GalacticraftAPI:$version" } Kotlin DSL ( build.gradle.kts ) repositories { maven ( "https://maven.galacticraft.dev" ) { content { includeGroup ( "dev.galacticraft" ) } } } dependencies { include ( modApi ( "dev.galacticraft:GalacticraftAPI: $ version " ) {}) }
docs.title: Getting Started
